title: Risāla šarīfa muštamila ʽalā awāʾil al-kutub alatī talaqqait ʽan al-Imām al-Baṣrī bi-Makka al-mušarrifa alatī aǧāza bihā aš-šaiḫain
creator: ʽAbdallah Ibn-Sālim Ibn-Muḥammad Ibn-Sālim al-Baṣrī al-Makkī,
subject: Außereuropäische Handschriften
source: ʽAbdallah Ibn-Sālim Ibn-Muḥammad Ibn-Sālim al-Baṣrī al-Makkī,: Risāla šarīfa muštamila ʽalā awāʾil al-kutub alatī talaqqait ʽan al-Imām al-Baṣrī bi-Makka al-mušarrifa alatī aǧāza bihā aš-šaiḫain. Berlin
